oil_well_report: this is basically a practice test run
2024-03-19 checking in again to see what is happending

questions.question: have you eaten?
questions.answer:
I am a chatbot. I cannot eat like humans.
 However (if you insist), I would love a good 'chip and dip' for a binary snack 

 Don't forget the 'cookies' for dessert

questions.question: that is a good joke.
questions.answer: Thank you. I am glad you enjoyed it.

questions.question: who created you?
questions.answer:
Godman Onah is my creator.
A very cute guy.

questions.question: Tell me some oil and gas jokes
questions.answer:
sure.

Why did the oil rig break up with its partner?
Because it was tired of getting drilled!
